dict.acceptation: 金，黄金；金色；金币；金饰品；
金（制）的，含金的；金色的；金本位的；

sent.orig: In this context, Shandong gold, gold gold gold shares Shen yong performance.
sent.trans: 在此背景下，山东黄金、中金黄金等黄金股表现神勇。

sent.orig: Xiaoqinling gold ore deposit is a representative gold-bearing quartz vein deposit with high gold grade.
sent.trans: 小秦岭金矿是我国品位较富、具有代表性的含金石英脉矿床。

sent.orig: Gold mainly exists as gold minerals, including electrum, silver-bearing native gold.
sent.trans: 金以矿物态为主，金矿物主要为银金矿、含银自然金。

sent.orig: Hopefully, the famous-Brand gold necklace, gold Bracelet and gold ring will accompany you glitteringly.
sent.trans: 愿这种名牌金项链，金手链，金戒指，金光灿烂伴你行。

sent.orig: Gold alloy can be classified as white gold alloy and color gold alloy by color.
sent.trans: 金合金按照颜色分主要有白色金合金和彩色金合金两种。
